usage_instructions.description: How to use this prompt library with GitHub Copilot in VS Code
steps: 1. Use Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P) and search for 'DXP' commands
2. Select component type from Foundation, Feature, Project, or Component layers
3. Choose from available snippets like 'Configuration Service', 'Carousel Component', etc.
4. Generated code will be inserted at cursor position
5. Use the prompt manager for advanced search and filtering
6. Follow Helix architecture principles in the generated code
